title: Raw Sequence file
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a data file.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with Lattice objects.

derived_from.title: Derived from
derived_from.description: The sequencing run designation for the file.

read_count.title: Read count
read_count.description: Number of reads in fastq file.
read_count.comment: Do not submit. This will be filled in during checkfiles validation.

fastq_signature.title: Fastq signature
fastq_signature.description: Fastq file flowcell based unique signature to reference a file.
fastq_signature.comment: Do not submit. This value is calculated and posted by checkfiles script upon submission.

items.title: Flowcell based fastq signature part
items.description: Fastq file flowcell based unique signature to reference a file.
items.comment: Current convention is based on the Illumina unique sequence identifier, colon separated flowcell, lane, read_end(1/2/3) and barcode.

read_length.title: Read length
read_length.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the number of contiguous nucleotides determined by sequencing.
read_length.comment: Do not submit. This will be filled in during checkfiles validation.

read_name_structure.title: Fastq read name details
read_name_structure.description: For high-throughput sequencing FASTQ files, details of the read name structure
read_name_structure.comment: Zero-based position of flowcell, lane, etc. information within FASTQ read names splitted using space and : as delimiters

flowcell_id_location.title: Flowcell identifier location
flowcell_id_location.description: Location of the flowcell identifier in the read name
flowcell_id_location.comment: Zero-based location of the flowcell identifier in the read name, if you split read name using space and : as delimiters

lane_id_location.title: Lane identifier location
lane_id_location.description: Location of the lane identifier in the read name
lane_id_location.comment: Zero-based location of the lane identifier in the read name, if you split the read name using space and : as delimiters

read_number_location.title: Read number location
read_number_location.description: Location of the read number (1 or 2) in the read name
read_number_location.comment: Zero-based location of the read number in the read name, if you split the read name using space and : as delimiters

barcode_location.title: Barcode location
barcode_location.description: Location of the barcode in the read name
barcode_location.comment: Zero-based location of the barcode in the read name, if you split the read name using space and : as delimiters
